body:
Hi Marija.

Thanks for the feedback. I just tried the package on my work PC and I
saw the same message. I think it's because I build on Windows 7 and
the ntdll.dll files are slightly different. I never saw it on my test
machine at home, though.

Thomas

On Wed, Apr 21, 2010 at 8:21 AM, Marija Velickovic <maricanis@gmail.com> wrote:
subject: [Radiance-general] Re: wxfalsecolor v0.1 binary downloadavailable
